content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany as well as a chart free you tube left handed tutorial https //youtu be/n3rf13pr0o0 right handed tutorial https //youtu be/6qbenu1re1m description worked in vertical row in 2 panels then seamed together a quick easy to make pattern material 4 5mm hook 2 weight yarn i used ice yarn natural garden bamboo/cotton/linen blend gauge 15sts x 7 double_crochet row = 4 inches chain 17 work first 8 row of pattern abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 together blo - back loop only skip - skip space - space sts - stitches sizes available written as listed s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x based off bust measurement there is positive ease s - 34 -750 yds m - 37 - 825 yds l - 40 - 900 yds xl - 42 - 950 yds 2x - 46 - 1 025 yds 3x - 51 - 1 100 yds 4x - 54 - 1 150 yds 5x - 58 - 1 200 yds sizing notes panel length will measure top portion of the body from the front part of your waist over your bust and shoulder down your back to the same part of your waist it should sit just a few inches above your hips width of body portion of the panel is 1/4 the bust size ** if you have to go up in hook size to meet gauge consider changing to a thicker yarn or adjusting pattern by adding row or chains a larger hook gives a large amount of stretch and your work will stretch too much youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_f… join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off
